subcommands.name: adopt
subcommands.description: Adopt an existing agent workspace into the instance registry

arguments.description: Path to the agent workspace directory (contains .actant.json)

options.description: Register with a different name than in .actant.json

subcommands.name: attach
subcommands.description: Attach an externally-spawned process to an agent

options.description: Process ID of the externally-spawned agent

subcommands.name: chat
subcommands.description: Start an interactive chat session with an agent

options.description: Template name (auto-creates instance if not found)

subcommands.name: create
subcommands.description: Create a new agent from a template

options.description: Launch mode: direct, acp-background, acp-service, one-shot
Disable auto-start even if archetype implies it
Custom workspace directory (absolute or relative path)
Same as --work-dir: create instance at external path instead of builtin location
If instance directory exists, remove it and recreate
If work-dir exists, add agent files into it

subcommands.name: destroy
subcommands.description: Destroy an agent (removes workspace directory)

subcommands.name: detach
subcommands.description: Detach an externally-managed process from an agent

options.description: Clean up ephemeral workspace after detach
Task priority: low, normal, high, critical

subcommands.name: list
subcommands.description: List all agents

options.description: Maximum number of records to show
Template name (auto-creates instance if not found)
Skip registering the process with the daemon

arguments.description: Agent name (must be started with `agent start`)

options.description: Specific ACP session ID (uses primary session if omitted)

subcommands.name: resolve
subcommands.description: Resolve spawn info for an agent (external spawn support)

options.description: Template name (auto-creates instance if not found)

subcommands.name: run
subcommands.description: Send a prompt to an agent and get the response

subcommands.name: start
subcommands.description: Start an agent

subcommands.name: status
subcommands.description: Show agent status (all agents if no name given)

subcommands.name: stop
subcommands.description: Stop a running agent
